org.cougaar.core.service
Interface ConditionService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface ConditionService
extends Service

This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to look up sensor data on the blackboard.

Nested Class Summary
static interface ConditionService.Listener
          The interface to be implemented by listener objects for this service.
 
Method Summary
 void addListener(ConditionService.Listener cb)
          Add a listener object.
 java.util.Set getAllConditionNames()
          Get the names of all known Conditions.

Method Detail

getConditionByName

Condition getConditionByName(java.lang.String sensor)
Get a Condition object by name.

getAllConditionNames

java.util.Set getAllConditionNames()
Get the names of all known Conditions.

addListener

void addListener(ConditionService.Listener cb)
Add a listener object. The given object will be publishChanged whenever any Condition is added, removed, or changed. The Object must already have been publishedAdded to the blackboard by the caller.

removeListener

void removeListener(ConditionService.Listener cb)
Remove a listener object. The given object will no longer be publishChanged whenever any Condition is added, removed, or changed. The Object should not be removed from the blackboard until it has been removed as a listener.
